== Getting Bigloo ==

In order to install HOP, the ,(<A> :href (home-bigloo-url) "Bigloo") compiler 
has first to be installed. Bigloo version 2.8 or higher is required for 
compiling HOP.

~~ Bigloo versions may be downloaded
from: ,(<A> :href (home-ftp-bigloo-url) (home-ftp-bigloo-url)).
